titleStmt.title: A catalogue of books printed at the Theater in Oxford, since the first printing there, which was in the year 1672, to 1682 (with several others): and sold in London, by Moses Pitt at the Angel against the Great North-door of St. Pauls-Church 1682. Those with an asterisc are printed at the Theater.
titleStmt.author: Pitt, Moses, fl. 1645-1696.
University of Oxford.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Books printed at the Theater, &c. and sold by M. Pitt.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
